A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Total BETRAYAL of the Star Wars canon!  The Skywalker story is the basis of our entrance into this Universe.  To deny and repudiate that mythos is unpardonable!  There was no overarching  need to re-invent the franchise.  Mediocre minds were given the keys to the kingdom and have vomited out a warped and twisted vision of a classic saga now bereft of all he magic it once possessed.   The schoolyard bully has just kicked everyone in the nards and told us it was wonderful .
